products.title: Valencia Orange Embers Roller Blind
products.description: Choose their striking orange roller blind to add a stunning splash of colour. Its as bright as bright can be. This blind will add a funky zing to any interior; think family rooms, breakfast rooms, rooms featuring strong blocks of colour as well as childrens bedrooms.

products.description: This bright orange roller blind will brighten any room and offers wonderful light filtering, and moisture resistant properties meaning you can can achieve complete privacy without completely blocking light from coming into the room. This orange fabric will look stunning paired with natural wooden tones or will offer a perfect splash of colour when hung in a cool, compemporary grey scheme. Their rollers are great for privacy and light control.

products.title: Stirlo Tiger Orange
products.description: Stirlo tiger orange plain roller blind the stirlo range boast a fantastic range of dim-out privacy fabrics to compliment any room. The fabric is composed of 100% polyester and is rolled around a strong, rust free aluminium tube. The blind is supplied with a premium control mechanism with white chain used as standard, or a nickel metal chain can be chosen above to upgrade. Supplied with the blinds are installation instructions and universal brackets suitable for top, side and face fixing.
